## ForkJoinOpts.worker property

An existing `Worker` instance, a JS source code `Blob` or an URL string. In the latter two cases, a worker is created automatically using `makeWorker()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
worker: string | Worker | Blob;
```
